name: Save Koch
description: You are local mafia kingpin, Jeffrey Koch. Your empire in New Kandinski is in total chaos because an unknown Mastermind has decided to take your place. And they’ve planted a sleeper Mole inside your operation. It’s time to act, but you need to act smart.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8Ghz, AMD Athlon X2 64 2.4Ghz. Graphics: 256MB NVIDIA 7900 / 256MB ATI X1900 Storage: 1024 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1,Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8Ghz, AMD Athlon X2 64 2.4Ghz. Graphics: gtx 950 or better Storage: 1024 MB available space
